member.name: M:Microsoft.ML.DnnCatalog.RetrainDnnModel(Microsoft.ML.ModelOperationsCatalog,System.String[],System.String[],System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrain the dnn model on new data.
member.param: The names of the model inputs.
The names of the requested model outputs.
Name of the label column.
Name of the node in DNN graph that is used as label during training in Dnn. The value of from is fed to this node.
The name of the optimization operation in the Dnn graph.
Path to model file to retrain.
Number of training iterations.
Number of samples to use for mini-batch training.
The name of the operation in the Dnn graph to compute training loss (Optional).
The name of the operation in the Dnn graph to compute performance metric during training (Optional).
The name of the operation in the Dnn graph which sets optimizer learning rate (Optional).
Learning rate to use during optimization (Optional).

Add a batch dimension to the input e.g. input = [224, 224, 3] => [-1, 224, 224, 3]. This parameter is used to deal with models that have unknown shape but the internal operators in the model require data to have batch dimension as well.
member.remarks: The support for retraining is under preview.

member.summary: Performs image classification using transfer learning.
member.param: The name of the input features column.
The name of the labels column.
The name of the output score column.
The name of the output predicted label columns.
The architecture of the image recognition DNN model.
Number of training iterations. Each iteration/epoch refers to one pass over the dataset.
The batch size for training.
The learning rate for training.
Callback for reporting model statistics during training phase.
Indicates the frequency of epochs at which to report model statistics during training phase.
Indicates the choice of DNN training framework. Currently only tensorflow is supported.
Optional name of the path where a copy new graph should be saved. The graph will be saved as part of model.
The name of the prefix for the final mode and checkpoint files.
Validation set.
Indicates to evaluate the model on train set after every epoch.
Indicates to not re-compute cached trainset bottleneck values if already available in the bin folder.
Indicates to not re-compute validataionset cached bottleneck validationset values if already available in the bin folder.
Indicates the file path to store trainset bottleneck values for caching.
Indicates the file path to store validationset bottleneck values for caching.
member.remarks: The support for image classification is under preview.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnModel

member.summary: Updates the model on the disk. After retraining Session and Graphs are both up-to-date However model on disk is not which is used to serialzed to ML.Net stream

member.name: T:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.Options
member.summary: The options for the .

member.name: F:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.Options.ModelLocation
member.summary: Location of the TensorFlow model.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.Options.InputColumns
member.summary: The names of the model inputs.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.Options.OutputColumns
member.summary: The names of the requested model outputs.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.Options.LabelColumn
member.summary: The name of the label column in that will be mapped to label node in TensorFlow model.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.Options.TensorFlowLabel
member.summary: The name of the label in TensorFlow model.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.Options.OptimizationOperation
member.summary: Name of the operation in TensorFlow graph that is used for optimizing parameters in the graph. Usually it is the name specified in the minimize method of optimizer in python e.g. optimizer = tf.train.GradientDescentOptimizer(learning_rate).minimize(cost, name = "SGDOptimizer").

member.name: F:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.Options.LossOperation
member.summary: The name of the operation in the TensorFlow graph to compute training loss (Optional).

member.name: F:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.Options.MetricOperation
member.summary: The name of the operation in the TensorFlow graph to compute performance metric during training (Optional).

member.name: F:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.Options.BatchSize
member.summary: Number of samples to use for mini-batch training.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.Options.Epoch
member.summary: Number of training iterations.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.Options.LearningRateOperation
member.summary: The name of the operation in the TensorFlow graph which sets optimizer learning rate (Optional).

member.name: F:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.Options.LearningRate
member.summary: Learning rate to use during optimization.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.Options.SaveLocationOperation
member.summary: Name of the input in TensorFlow graph that specifiy the location for saving/restoring models to/from disk. This parameter is set by different kinds of 'Savers' in TensorFlow and users don't have control over this. Therefore, its highly unlikely that this parameter is changed from its default value of 'save/Const'. Please change it cautiously if you need to.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.Options.SaveOperation
member.summary: Name of the operation in TensorFlow graph that is used for saving/restoring models to/from disk. This parameter is set by different kinds of 'Savers' in TensorFlow and users don't have control over this. Therefore, its highly unlikely that this parameter is changed from its default value of 'save/control_dependency'. Please change it cautiously if you need to.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.Options.AddBatchDimensionInputs
member.summary: Add a batch dimension to the input e.g. input = [224, 224, 3] => [-1, 224, 224, 3].
member.remarks: This parameter is used to deal with models that have unknown shape but the internal operators in the model require data to have batch dimension as well. In this case, there is no way to induce shape from the model's inputs or input data.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.GetOutputSchema(Microsoft.ML.SchemaShape)
member.summary: Returns the of the schema which will be produced by the transformer. Used for schema propagation and verification in a pipeline.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnRetrainEstimator.Fit(Microsoft.ML.IDataView)
member.summary: Trains and returns a .

member.name: F:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.Dnn.DnnUtils.TensorflowOperatorTypeKind
member.summary: Key to access operator's type (a string) in . Its value describes the Tensorflow operator that produces this .

member.name: F:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.Dnn.DnnUtils.TensorflowUpstreamOperatorsKind
member.summary: Key to access upstream operators' names (a string array) in . Its value states operators that the associated 's generator depends on.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.Dnn.DnnUtils.CreateFolderWithAclIfNotExists(Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment,System.String)
member.summary: Given a folder path, create it with proper ACL if it doesn't exist. Fails if the folder name is empty, or can't create the folder.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.Dnn.DnnUtils.LoadDnnModel(Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Load TensorFlow model into memory.
member.param: The environment to use.
The model to load.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.Dnn.DnnUtils.Runner
member.summary: Use the runner class to easily configure inputs, outputs and targets to be passed to the session runner.

remarks.para: The runner has a simple API that allows developers to call the AddTarget, AddInput, AddOutput and Fetch to construct the parameters that will be passed to the TFSession.Run method.
Instances of this class are created by calling the GetRunner method on the TFSession.
The various methods in this class return an instance to the Runner itsel, to allow to easily construct chains of execution like this:
You do not need to chain the operations, this works just the same:

member.name: M:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.Dnn.DnnUtils.Runner.AddInput(System.String,Tensorflow.Tensor)
member.summary: Adds an input to the session specified by name, with an optional index in the operation (separated by a colon).
member.returns: An instance to the runner, so you can easily chain the operations together.
member.param: Incoming port, with an optional index separated by a colon.
Value to assing to the incoming port.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.Dnn.DnnUtils.Runner.Run
member.summary: Executes a pipeline given the specified inputs, inputValues, outputs, targetOpers, runMetadata and runOptions. A simpler API is available by calling the method which performs all the bookkeeping necessary.
member.returns: An array of tensors fetched from the requested outputs.

member.summary: The number of batches processed in an epoch.

member.summary: The training epoch index for which this metric is reported.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.ImageClassificationEstimator.TrainMetrics.Accuracy
member.summary: Accuracy of the batch on this . Higher the better.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.ImageClassificationEstimator.TrainMetrics.CrossEntropy
member.summary: Cross-Entropy (loss) of the batch on this . Lower the better.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.ImageClassificationEstimator.TrainMetrics.ToString
member.summary: String representation of the metrics.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.ImageClassificationEstimator.BottleneckMetrics
member.summary: Metrics for image featurization values. The input image is passed through the network and features are extracted from second or last layer to train a custom full connected layer that serves as classifier.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.ImageClassificationEstimator.BottleneckMetrics.DatasetUsed
member.summary: Indicates the dataset on which metrics are being reported.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.ImageClassificationEstimator.BottleneckMetrics.Name
member.summary: Name of the input image.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.ImageClassificationEstimator.BottleneckMetrics.Index
member.summary: Index of the input image.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.ImageClassificationEstimator.BottleneckMetrics.ToString
member.summary: String representation of the metrics.

member.summary: Indicates the kind of the dataset of which metric is reported.

member.summary: Contains train time metrics.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.ImageClassificationEstimator.ImageClassificationMetrics.Bottleneck
